Vision Mission Values
Simi Valley
Our home

The city of Simi Valley in the valley of the same name, is in the southeast corner of Ventura County, California, United States, 40 miles from downtown Los Angeles, making it part of the Greater Los Angeles Area. The city sits next to Thousand Oaks, Moorpark, and Chatsworth.

Know more

Mayor Keith Mashburn
On one simi

Since its foundation in 2020, One simi is working effectively and helping communities stand together irrespective of race, gender, nationality, sexual orientation, physical ability, and background.

Mayor Keith Mashburn
